Rewards Rate: 6 Reward Points per Rs. 200 spent, 30 Reward Points per Rs. 200 spent on chemist/pharmaceutical stores.
Reward Redemption: The reward points are redeemable on Yes Rewardz, 1 RP = Re. 0.25 when redeeming against hotel and flight bookings, and 1 RP = Re. 0.10 for redemption against product catalogue, gift vouchers, etc.
Travel: Get complimentary access to domestic lounges
Domestic Lounge Access: 8 complimentary access to domestic lounges annually (2 per quarter).
Insurance Benefits: Get a life insurance cover of Rs. 1 Crore, a medical insurance cover worth Rs. 25 lakhs, and a credit shield in case of primary cardholder's accidental death.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions above Rs. 400 and below Rs. 5,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 300 (whichever is higher).

product_details: Get 30 Reward Points for every Rs. 200 you spend on pharmaceutical/chemist stores.
Get 6 Reward Points for every Rs. 200 you spend on other purchases.
1000 Reward Points on YES PayNow successful registrations.
2 domestic lounge visits each calendar quarter.
Every month, you get 12 complimentary fitness sessions.
Life insurance cover worth Rs. 1 Crore.
Great offers across shopping, wellness, travel, etc.
